text: When I was 7, I came up with the idea of 'charm socks.' My mom would take me to buy bags of plastic charms, we would sew them on frilly white socks, and I sold them at school.
author: Sara Blakely

text: My Mom always cooked healthy. Greek food lends itself to cooking healthy.
author: Cat Cora

text: From the moment this baby came into our home, those two dogs have never been more in love. It's the most beautiful thing I've ever witnessed. People keep saying, 'Oh, you're a single mom.' I'm like, 'Actually, I'm not. I've got two boys helping.'
author: Charlize Theron

text: So far I'm not surprised by anything about being a mom. It's all pretty great - but that's what I expected.
author: Charlize Theron

text: I was worried about my mom more than I was worried about the president. And then I was worried about the president, and then I was worried about myself.
author: Monica Lewinsky
